definition: notes on the use of a book/guide to the reader
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: It may then be necessary to develop and validate an alternate procedure as allowed in the General Notices.
sentences.chinese: 因此，可能必须按照凡例中所说开发和验证替代规程。

sentences.english: The manufacturer may use an alternative validated method.
sentences.chinese: 凡例也允许使用其它经过验证的方法。

sentences.english: The General Notices allow for the use of an appropriately validated method.
sentences.chinese: 凡例也允许使用其它经过验证的方法。

definition: author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
manuscript (of a book etc)/sketch (of a design etc)
preface/foreword/preamble/recital (law)/also written 敘文|叙文[xu4 wen2]
short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
variant of 按語|按语[an4 yu3]
